name: A New Owner
description:
From the 100 Days of Drawing Series //

This 2021 personal challenge started in early March. The goal, to produce a finished piece, everyday, for 100 days  //


"She took the sword from the water and on contact with the night breeze it was engulfed in cold flames. The spirit of the lake was glad to be rid of this burden. It is no place for human treasures." 

3000x3000 JPG
